document_data.caption: A map showing Fergana Pass within Teyla Shan.
document_data.name: Fergana Pass
document_data.mainbody: '''Fergana Pass''' was a well-used route through the northern reaches of [[Teyla Shan]] in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: Caravans heading north from [[Semphar]] into the vast steppes often chose this route since [[Iris Well Spring]] was found within a short distance where the pass exited the mountains.
